message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DM, cs.MA, cs.GT

The paper focuses on data mining and optimisation techniques for display advertising, which involves real-time bidding and pricing schemes. Therefore, the most likely category is Information Retrieval (cs.IR), which deals with search engines, recommendation systems, and advertising. The paper also uses statistical and machine learning techniques for optimisation, which suggests a possible fit with Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Data Mining (cs.DM) categories. Additionally, the paper mentions risk management and portfolio-based solutions, which could relate to Multi-Agent Systems (cs.MA) and Game Theory (cs.GT) categories.
